divs: Sighting DetailsI was removing snow from the roof of abuilding at the corner of the Bodenberg and Plumley Rd. intersection in 1992. Inoticed everything was glowing blue and I called my renters outside. We allthen observed a blue beam about 6 inches in diameter short out a utilitytransformer and cause the wires to start whipping. Then the object placed thebeam into a substation about 100 feet from me and caused arcing and sparking. Inotified the military one base commander of the 3rd composite wing in Anchorage,Ak while the object was still hovering. I informed him the object was headedwest towards the Elmendorf air base. He believed me and told me no radarsignatures were being seen. He knew exactly where I was and he even mentionedif I was near the metal building on the corner which was absolutely correct. The snow storm front was just passing and he asked me if I was on the edge ofthe storm front which was also correct.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Butte
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: aeriel object projecting blue beam onto electrical
